shmyaza, if for some reason you are not able to upload the games, I just want to say thanks for all the great rugby weekends you shared with us. You are still the man!
yeah, i gotta agree with SombraNBK..you da man! Here's hoping all is well with you.
People where can we download the rugby?Week 8 ??

Has Shemyaza, the man, the myth, the legend ever commented on all our heartfelt gratitude or any other comments? Personally never seen any comments from our saviour... let's hope all is well!! Come back you awsome uploader!! ;)
okay, this is just getting ridiculous now :(  Is there NO ONE else that posts any of the Super Rugby action?
No, shemyaza is "the ONE"!
shemyaza, Why is there a space between Lyons and Spakowski?
week 9 plz
i just want to say thanks so much for the last 7 weeks of super rugby. really appreciate it. if moneys the problem, i'll gladly donate some money to help you post future games.

hey dolfyner, yes, shemyaza has commented back from time to time...and i agree, i do hope all is well with him.

on another note: has anyone been able to find any downloads for the current Super Rugby season? Highlights are ok but I wanna see entire matches!
hey shemyaza...you should set some sort of donation accout!...id gladly give a lil...thanks for your uploads!

I would also like to express my appreciation for the work involved with getting this torrent up each and every week. I would also donate if it meant that this torrent is up each week because I solely rely on you to watch super rugby. Thanks again for all your hard work. Keep it up :)

For all those struggling to find games, head over to http://acrossthetasman.com, set up an account and dive into the excellent forums therein.

Shemyaza has been good to us, but it's time we left the nest and foraged for ourselves.
